summary: This folder acts as the source root for the VastCtl CLI application, housing the core command-line interface logic and orchestration. It serves as the bridge between the user-facing CLI commands and the underlying business logic for GPU provisioning and cloud synchronization.
responsibilities: Organize the CLI source code structure
Provide the entry point for the vastctl command-line tool
Manage the lifecycle of the CLI execution context
Coordinate between user input and backend service calls
